question: Which among the following is the most unique feature of Dholavira site of the Indus Valley Civilization?
option1: Its cities were horizontally divided in multiple parts
option3: Its cities were divided into 3 parts
answer: Its cities were divided into 3 parts
explanation: The most unique features of Dholavira, an Indus valley site in Gujarat, is its division. While other Indus Valley sites were divided into two parts viz. Citadel and Lower Town, Dholavira was divided into three divisions.
